message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor.  It's a fair starting point considering the inflation factor will benefit you more in the next round.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I propose a 60/40 split. This recognizes the inflation dynamics while offering a more equitable outcome.
I understand your desire for a fairer split, Bob.  However, the inflation still favors you more than me. I'm willing to compromise, but 55/45 is my final offer.
Alice, we're approaching a critical point where further delays will significantly erode the value of the money for both of us.  Let's end this now with a fair and straightforward 50/50 split.
